Footer.ctaHeading: Ready to improve your Google Ads results?
Footer.ctaDescription: Free consultation. No obligation. Response within 24h.
Footer.brandDescription: Google Ads Strategist with 9+ years of experience. 50+ brands across 6+ countries.

WhyMe.heading: Why clients choose a dedicated specialist over an agency

experience.title: 9+ years managing Google Ads daily
experience.description: Certified across all campaign types — from Search to Performance Max. Hands-on account management since day one.

results.title: Proven results backed by data
results.description: 3.7x ROAS for eCommerce, -50% CPA for lead gen, 12x revenue growth. Real numbers, not promises.

international.title: Multi-market experience across UK, US & EU
international.description: Campaigns for UK eCommerce, US direct-to-consumer, and European B2B. I understand the nuances of each market.

ai.title: AI-powered efficiency at scale
ai.description: Custom scripts, Claude, and Gemini for analysis, ad copy, and automation. More time for strategy, less on repetitive tasks.

direct.title: Work directly with the expert
direct.description: No account managers relaying messages. No juniors learning on your budget. Direct communication with the person in your account.

transparent.title: Full transparency with no surprises
transparent.description: Every dollar accounted for. Actionable monthly reports, not generic PDF decks. No long-term contracts — results keep you.

FinalCTA.heading: Ready to scale your results?
FinalCTA.description: Book a free consultation and discover how Google Ads can work harder for your business. No obligation, no pressure.

CaseStudiesPreview.heading: Results That Speak for Themselves
